 --- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
AzureBlade snorted deriively at Cheetor. Then, he
sent, back to 
Shadimus, an image of a ravaged Cybertron, where the
Maximals were 
enslaved by... Decepticons?

AzureBlade: You should know that we will both make the
difference in 
the War against Unicron. We cannot win if we kill each
other. Would 
you be responsible for Unicron eating the original
Optimus Prime and 
banishing Cybertron to eternal war?

He starts walking stoically past Shadimus.

AzureBlade: And, I do know full well the extent of
what I have done, 
or rather what I have endured, Decepticon. Should you
try to kill 
me, or even to fight me, you would not be any
different from your 
original programming.

He waits a few moments, waiting for a reaction.
-----------------------------------------------------
Shadowcaster studies him heavily as he speaks. He is
aware of Cheetor's presence, however, at the same
time, he decides that reunions can wait. The image
sent to him by azure is nothing new to him, he was
well aware of the original megatron's brutal reign, as
well as of just how great the menace of Unicron was
firsthand- being one of the ones to fight him off
during his brutal physical pounding of his homeworld
in 2005.

"You keep asuming I intend to stop you by lethal
force. I totally agree that we need all the warriors
we can to fight him off. Like I said, I have no
intention of letting that virus corrupt you any
further by letting you leave."

With lethal speed and precision, Shadowcaster pulls
out his lock pistol and fires a point blank
transmission square on at Azure before he can react.

"I do apologise Azure, but I'm not about to let
another bot go dpwn the dark deep path I've been on."
